snippet: Minnesota Vikings defensive end Spencer Nealy was handed a four-game doping suspension by the National Football League on Friday for using a banned stimulant that he claimed was taken unknowingly.
lead_paragraph: Minnesota Vikings defensive end Spencer Nealy was handed a four-game doping suspension by the National Football League on Friday for using a banned stimulant that he claimed was taken unknowingly.

headline.print_headline: NFL: Vikings defender Nealy banned four games for doping
